Other than various claims, there is no evidence that anything will happen i=
n=A0 2012: it will be the same as every other end-of-world prediction made =
before.

Then someone will "recalculate", or proclaim a new EVP message, an=
d point at 2013!=A0 Or 2014!=A0 

However, I really do like it when people =
pick specific dates for predictions.=A0 Besides being entertaining, it give=
s everyone a chance to judge for themselves just how much the predictor is =
like all the others who have marched around carrying=A0 those "THE END OF T=
HE WORLD IS NIGH" signs.=A0 Full of nothing but themselves and their=A0 del=
usions.

--- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...=
> wrote:

From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP=
-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday,=
 October 14, 2009, 2:59 PM






=A0




    
                   And you ca=
n expect the debunking to escalate,  but go ahead--everyone knows the media=
 always tells the truth. 

 Trillions of $$$ are missing, and some suspect =
it's been used to build secret bunkers for the elite to ride out the shift =
in, and you think they are not going to spend a bit more on dis-information=
 to keep panicked hords from over running their hidy holes. 



These same =
sources you quote will also tell you there are no sprits, hence no EVP, yet=
 you don't believe that. 



Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every frea=
king culture in the world has the exact same predictions- the exact same da=
te-just coincidence no doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in comm=
on with mayan calendar creators as I have with the man in the moon to know =
anything at all about it. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an=
 opinion that is gospel and unquestionable. You can find any information yo=
u want to hear, whether it's EVP or 2012.



You better take a closer look =
at your world, if nothing happens to change this crap hole, the future is e=
xtrememly bleak-- a slow rotting death that goes on for milenia. 



F-S
